item.name: startphp
item.description: This is a parsecode that is used to create the start PHP tag in the class file. It is necessary because starting PHP uses XML reserved characters.

item.name: security
item.description: This item generates the security check that must be in all Chisimba scripts to prevent the scripts from being run directly instead of by the Chsimba engine.

item.name: class
item.description: This item sets up the skeleton of the dbtable class which is then parsed to replace the parsecodes with the actual values of the items.

item.name: endphp
item.description: This is a parsecode that is used to create the end PHP tag in the class file. It is necessary because ending PHP uses XML reserved characters.
